SEARCH
Package game.mills

Interface Player

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaselineAgent, HumanPlayer, MinimaxAIPlayer
public interface Player
The Player interface defines the essential moves and parameters for any player of the game. It includes methods for retrieving player information, managing the number of stones a player has, and tracking the game state for the player.

    decrementStonesOnBoard()
    Decreases the number of stones the player has on the board by one.
